locked_version.title: Locked version
locked_version.body: This version is locked, and the previous one must be completed before you can access this version.

error.no_internet: You are currently not connected to the Internet.

hints.fulfilled: The requested hint has been delivered.
hints.not_fulfilled: The requested hint could not be delivered.

restart.title: Confirmation
restart.body: Are you sure you want to restart this version from scratch?

upgrade.title: Congratulations!
upgrade.proposal: We suggest you try the {{stars}}-star version.
